articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: 290-foot and 170-foot giant asteroids among 5 zooming towards Earth, NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: 5 asteroids, 4 of them gigantic in size, are zooming towards planet Earth. This includes a 290-foot monster and a 170-foot giant. While four will be nearing the planet today, one will do so on Tuesday, March 28.
articles.content: Top SectionsExplore Tech Copyright © HT Media Limited All rights reserved.
